QueryDefinition.Query: select patid, cast(CONCAT(cast(patid as varchar), cast(spno as varchar)) as bigint) as visit_occurrence_id, CONCAT(cast(patid as varchar), cast(epikey as varchar)) as description, epistart, epiend, icd, case when d_order = 1 then 44786627 else 44786629 end as type_concept_id FROM {sc}.diagnoses_episode join {sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND patid = ch.PERSON_ID order by patid
